alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas; Iron; Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:27PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN BAYFIELD, SOUTHEASTERN DOUGLAS, SOUTHWESTERN IRON, SOUTHERN ASHLAND, NORTHERN PRICE AND NORTHERN SAWYER COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM CDT... At 1227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Seeley, to near Clam Lake, to near Park Falls, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Butternut and Clam Lake around 1230 PM CDT. Park Falls and Fifield around 1235 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Glidden, Namekagon Lake and Namekagon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas; Iron; Price; Sawyer
